alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 23 at 9:52AM AKDT until August 23 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash surf to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Through 6 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Items left on the beach will likely wash away. Waves could splash onto docks near Prudhoe Bay. Debris will wash onto beaches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds will gust to 40 mph this morning and will continue through this afternoon. These winds will push waves high up the beach to near the vegetation line causing minor erosion and wash away items left on the beach. The worst conditions will be on west facing beaches. Winds and waves will decrease this evening.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
